mapper.sql: epi.id as img_id,epi.img_type as img_img_type,epi.original_name as img_original_name,epi.product_id as img_product_id,epi.img_url as img_img_url,epi.data_status as img_data_status,epi.remark as img_remark,epi.is_main as img_is_main,epi.img_order as img_img_order,epi.create_user as img_create_user,epi.create_time as img_create_time,epi.update_user as img_update_user,epi.update_time as img_update_time

ebm.id AS bulk_id,ebm.bulk_material_no AS bulk_bulk_material_no,ebm.bulk_material_type AS bulk_bulk_material_type,ebm.bulk_material_name AS bulk_bulk_material_name,ebm.material_id AS bulk_material_id,ebm.material_no AS bulk_material_no,ebm.current_warehouse_id AS bulk_current_warehouse_id,ebm.current_warehouse_position_id AS bulk_current_warehouse_position_id,ebm.owner_warehouse_id AS bulk_owner_warehouse_id,ebm.owner_warehouse_position_id AS bulk_owner_warehouse_position_id,ebm.brand_id AS bulk_brand_id,ebm.material_model_id AS bulk_material_model_id,ebm.material_capacity_value AS bulk_material_capacity_value,ebm.bulk_material_price AS bulk_bulk_material_price,ebm.bulk_material_status AS bulk_bulk_material_status,ebm.data_status AS bulk_data_status,ebm.remark AS bulk_remark,ebm.create_time AS bulk_create_time,ebm.create_user AS bulk_create_user,ebm.update_time AS bulk_update_time,ebm.update_user AS bulk_update_user
mapper.select:
SELECT equipment_main.*
FROM ( SELECT
ep.product_name AS product_name, ewc.warehouse_name as current_warehouse_name, ewo.warehouse_name as owner_warehouse_name, epu.sku_name as sku_name
FROM erp_product_equipment epe INNER JOIN erp_product ep ON epe.product_id = ep.id INNER JOIN erp_product_sku epu ON epe.sku_id = epu.id INNER JOIN erp_warehouse ewc ON epe.current_warehouse_id = ewc.id INNER JOIN erp_warehouse ewo ON epe.owner_warehouse_id = ewo.id where epe.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and epe.data_status = 1 ) equipment_main LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment_bulk_material epebm ON equipment_main.id = epebm.equipment_id and epebm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON epebm.bulk_material_id = ebm.id AND ebm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epi ON epi.product_id = equipment_main.product_id AND epi.data_status = 1 AND epi.img_type = 1
SELECT FROM erp_order eo INNER JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON eo.order_no=epe.order_no WHERE eo.data_status=1 AND eo.buyer_customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT FROM erp_product_equipment epe LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_equipment esoe ON epe.id=esoe.equipment_id AND esoe.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order eso ON eso.stock_order_no = esoe.stock_order_no AND eso.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order epro ON epro.purchase_receive_no = eso.refer_no AND epro.data_status=1 AND eso.cause_type=1 LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_order epo ON epro.purchase_order_id = epo.id AND epro.data_status=1 WHERE epo.purchase_no = #{purchaseOrderNo} AND epo.data_status = 1 AND auto_allot_status != 1

SELECT ,,ep.product_name,eprop.product_amount AS src_purchase_price FROM erp_purchase_order epo LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order epro ON epro.purchase_order_id = epo.id AND epro.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order eso ON epro.purchase_receive_no = eso.refer_no AND eso.data_status=1 AND eso.cause_type=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_equipment esoe ON eso.stock_order_no = esoe.stock_order_no AND esoe.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON epe.id=esoe.equipment_id AND epe.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epi ON epi.product_id = epe.product_id AND epi.data_status = 1 AND epi.img_type = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product ep ON epe.product_id = ep.id LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order_product eprop ON eprop.id = esoe.item_refer_id AND eprop.data_status=1 WHERE esoe.item_refer_id = #{maps.queryParam.purchaseReceiveOrderProductId} AND epo.data_status = 1 AND auto_allot_status != 1 LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM erp_purchase_order epo LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order epro ON epro.purchase_order_id = epo.id AND epro.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order eso ON epro.purchase_receive_no = eso.refer_no AND eso.data_status=1 AND eso.cause_type=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_equipment esoe ON eso.stock_order_no = esoe.stock_order_no AND esoe.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment epe ON epe.id=esoe.equipment_id AND epe.data_status=1 WHERE esoe.item_refer_id = #{maps.queryParam.purchaseReceiveOrderProductId} AND epo.data_status = 1 AND auto_allot_status != 1
SELECT count(1) FROM erp_product_equipment epe WHERE epe.data_status=1 AND epe.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT equipment_main.*
FROM ( SELECT
ep.product_name AS product_name, ewc.warehouse_name as current_warehouse_name, ewo.warehouse_name as owner_warehouse_name, epu.sku_name as sku_name
FROM erp_product_equipment epe INNER JOIN erp_product ep ON epe.product_id = ep.id INNER JOIN erp_product_sku epu ON epe.sku_id = epu.id INNER JOIN erp_warehouse ewc ON epe.current_warehouse_id = ewc.id INNER JOIN erp_warehouse ewo ON epe.owner_warehouse_id = ewo.id where epe.equipment_no = #{equipmentNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and epe.data_status = 1 ) equipment_main LEFT JOIN erp_product_equipment_bulk_material epebm ON equipment_main.id = epebm.equipment_id and epebm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON epebm.bulk_material_id = ebm.id AND ebm.data_status = 1 LEFT JOIN erp_product_img epi ON epi.product_id = equipment_main.product_id AND epi.data_status = 1 AND epi.img_type = 1

set.if: order_no = CASE WHEN #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}='' THEN NULL ELSE #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} END,
